item.title: Some neat links
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: How to stream audio and video to a mobile phone - Sadly I don't have one of these fancy phones that accept 3GP files, all you fancy cellphone video watching people! Chihuly at Fairchild: A Garden of Glass - Chihuly will be exhibiting at Fairchild Gardens in Coral Gables from December 3
